DOC.criteria: COPD ( FEV1/FVC < 0.70 ) Healthy subject : evidence airway obstruction ( FEV1/FVC > 0.70 FEV1 > 0.80 predict ) Smoking history > 10 packyears Exsmoker > 6 month Chronic hypoxemia and/or hypercapnia ( PaO2 < 60 mmHg SpO2 < 88 % rest and/or PaCO2 > 45 mmHg ) Recent exacerbation oral corticosteroid ( < 2 month ) Recent cancer ( < 3 year ) Diabetes Myopathy , neuromuscular , neurological articular disease Kidney disease Other respiratory disease Unstable cardiac disease Physical activity score > 9 Voorips questionnaire BMI > 30
